scripts.hubs:clone: test -d hubs || git clone https://github.com/mozilla/hubs hubs
scripts.hubs:patch: npm run hubs:reset && cd hubs && find ../patches -type f -name '*.patch' ! -size 0 | sort | xargs -t -n1 patch -p1 -i
scripts.hubs:unpatch: cd hubs && find ../patches -type f -name '*.patch' ! -size 0 | sort -r | xargs -t -n1 patch -R -p1 -i
scripts.makepatch: set -eo pipefail && cd hubs && git diff -U6 > ../patches/RENAME_ME.patch
scripts.build-gh: cd hubs && cross-env BASE_ASSETS_PATH=/custom-hubs-template/ npm run build
